answers.answer: I hope some of our Singapore readers can give you this information.  Some of it should be available on the Internet by checking with doctors or medical agencies as well.  You have time to make this decision, as you are going to need to heal from the sad events that were so recent.  You cannot carry a pregnancy with certainty until your C-section incision in the uterus is healed, and that is a matter of at least some months.  Good luck, I hope answers come your way.

question: i gave birth to premature twins during 26w 5d. in chennai. if i concieve again it is safe to have in chennai or singapore since my hubby lives in singapore. my mom is telling us to change our job to chennai till next childbirth since it is safe and treatment will be good in chennai.my doubt is whether singapore gives good treatment and wat will be cost? is their any tamil speaking doctors avail their and i had diabetes in last pregnancy. this time i need my child to be healthy and wants to go atleast upto 39w.sorry for such a big question.thnx for all your answers.
title: treatment and cost of whole pregnancy cycle in singapore
